code: public void configureHttpClient(HttpClientBuilder clientBuilder) {     clientBuilder.setProxy(new HttpHost(host, port, scheme)).     if (username != null && password != null) {         Credentials defaultcreds.         if (domain != null) {             defaultcreds = new NTCredentials(username, password, ntHost, domain).         } else {             defaultcreds = new UsernamePasswordCredentials(username, password).         }         BasicCredentialsProvider credentialsProvider = new BasicCredentialsProvider().         credentialsProvider.setCredentials(AuthScope.ANY, defaultcreds).         clientBuilder.setDefaultCredentialsProvider(credentialsProvider).     } }
